name: Clicktrans.pl
description: All transport services in one place
overview: Clicktrans.pl is the first online marketplace for transport services in Poland. It is a fast and easy way of finding very good transport opportunities for vehicles, heavy equipment, furniture and other items. Using typical transport services such as a courier or mail for such objects is generally impossible or very expensive. The idea of Clicktrans.pl is very simple: user who is seeking for a transport, lists items to move: describes them, adds photographs, specifies delivery details, sets preferred dates. Advertisement reaches thousands of transport companies registered on Clicktrans.pl and user gets free quotes from feedback rated transport providers. Thanks to bids in a reverse auction format he receives favorable offers. Clicktrans.pl matches consumers with delivery firms “going there anyway”. The concept is to utilize transport capacity that may be wasted in inefficient transport. Clicktrans.pl is a free tool helping to reduce transportation costs by up to 60%. It supports the idea of sustainable and ecological transport. Thanks to Clicktrans.pl CO2 emissions are largely reduced.
